title: Banned
body: Hi riot, this is ylonagarcia (ingame name: ylona garcia) and i recently log in on my account saying that I am banned. it doesnt even log me in and tell me what the reason im getting ban for? and plus I havent played league of legends for a week nor I remember being salty or flaming others players on those games I have played. I am a very positive person who is just looking forward to climb gold and suddenly I get banned for no reason??? this makes me sad and mad : (

replies.body: Hey there, I looked into this for you and it looks like the account was locked but not for behavioral reasons.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can give you more context directly and privately.  See you there!
and also it says i should check my email for the reason i got banned for and there was nothing in my email
